0.9.4 Release - iOS beta and small bug fixes

Release notes March 03, 2021

✎ Edit Post

The iOS beta is in full swing, if you’d like early access you’ll need to download Apple’s TestFlight application onto you devices and fill out this survey.

Quick Changelog

  • Fixed bug that prevented creating consecutive Logbooks
  • Fixed bug that exported ADI files in iOS as TXT files
  • Fixed bug that clears the wrong part of the POTA form
  • Upcase call sign input on Profile form
